review:
After seeing lot of positive reviews for many dental clinics, I got confused to choose the correct place.My friend has suggested this M.S.Dental Clinic.So,I fixed an appointment through mobile for my gum bleeding problem.The doctor has explained clearly about my problem and he suggested for teeth cleaning.I wanted to do that cleaning immediately and he did with patience and kept me in a comfortable zone.After the cleaning,he explained about how to brush and how to maintain the teeth properly.

He heard my issue and consoled me first with kind words and then he explained me about the issue and the first aid. Also he sent the medicines prescription immediately. In the late night, Dr Suresh was such an help to us when normally other doctors wouldnt be available at that time. Dr Suresh is amazing person, with excellent technical skills and experience.

review:
Took treatment for my father (65y), 

Initially we went to a hospital at keelkattalai for tooth pain and the pain killer they gave caused heavy infections.

and after a day we took appointment with Dr. Suresh he was very kind and given proper procedures but already the infection spreaded all over the organs which leads to internal bleeding because of his advice i admitted my father at a super speciality hospital ICU and during the hospitalization Dr. Suresh contacted me 4 times a day to know about the status of my father which was very supportive for me at that moment,  

After a month treatment my father recovered now and then now we went again to Dr. Suresh for my father tooth problems and again am surprised to see the care and kindness while providing the treatment. 

I have never seen such a great Doctor Who cares this much really am thankful for him.

Thanks Dr. Suresh
